Fruit juice concentrate (may contain apple, grape &/or raspberry), water, citric acid (for tartness), flavour, colour, sucralose, acesulfame potassium, potassium sorbate.Contains 25 mg sucralose and 5 mg acesulfame potassium per 2 ml serving.
